title: Slab Serif Similar to Tabac and Sanchez Slab
author: mustangpinky1

comments.content:
Best match is Klinic Slab, available from Lost Type:  
 [http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=klinic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134125/http:/www.losttype.com/font/?name=klinic "http://www.losttype.com/font/?name=klinic")

Close second would be Equip Slab:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hoftype/equip-slab/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134125/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hoftype/equip-slab/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hoftype/equip-slab/")
